snippet.title: JDM: Rise of the Scorpion | Official Prologue Teaser
snippet.description:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1364930/JDM_Rise_of_the_Scorpion 
GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/jdm_rise_of_the_scorpion 
Epic: https://store.epicgames.com/p/japanese-drift-master-jdm-rise-of-the-scorpion-b0ced8 

The time has come for the Rise of the Scorpion! 
Discover the beginning of the story of the Hatori Hasashi, explore new areas, and race on miles of diverse roads and winding mountain tracks.
 
This free prologue will be available this summer. It’s a one and only introduction to the world of the Japanese Drift Master.

Check our social media: https://linktr.ee/japanesedriftmaster  
Check our website: https://jdmgame.com/rise-of-the-scorpion/ 

#Gameplay #Japanesedriftmaster #JDM #Drift #Simracing #Prologue #Gaming
